For each reported disease, we identified the species with the highest STP. A total of 54 plant species has thus been identified and considered as having effective therapeutic potential (Table 3). Hernia is the pathology with the highest number of reported medicinal plant remedies. Elaeis guineensis Jacq. is said to be used to treat the highest number of diseases including amoebiasis, dental caries, migraine, sciatic neuralgia, splenomegaly, and rheumatism (Table 3).
